flawed_nl_solution:
It's 2021 and Mark was born in 1976 so Mark is 2021-1976 = <<2021-1976=45>>45 years old
Graham is 3 years younger than Mark who is 45 so Graham is 45-3 = 40 years old
Janice is 1/2 the age of Graham who is 40 so Janice is 40/2 = <<40/2=20>>20 years old
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42, not 40. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
